title: Jorgenson Unrattled Under Pressure for Second-Straight GC Win at Paris-Nice: ‘It’s Crazy to Say’
content:
Huge day for USA as 22-year-old Sheffield wins final stage solo and Jorgenson defends overnight GC lead in three-hour thrill-ride around Nice.

Read the full article at Jorgenson Unrattled Under Pressure for Second-Straight GC Win at Paris-Nice: ‘It’s Crazy to Say’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
